program: Joint Honours in Feminist and Gender Studies and Political Science
notes: Enrolment in 4000-level courses in political science (POL) is limited to 4th year political science students.

Fall: FEM1100 | Introduction to Feminist and Gender Studies

Winter: 2 from: FEM2104, FEM2107, FEM2109, FEM2110, FEM2111

Fall: 1 Canadian Politics course from: POL3159, POL3171, POL3172, POL3174, POL4134, POL4150, POL4154, POL4162, POL4165, POL4166
1 optional FEM course from list of optional courses
Winter: POL3102 | Advanced Research Methods in Political Science
1 Comparative Politics course from: POL3114, POL3115, POL3144, POL3145, POL3162, POL3164, POL3180, POL4141, POL4184, POL4378
1 International Relations course from: POL3113, POL3123, POL3124, POL3176, POL3177, POL3179, POL4126, POL4127, POL4173, POL4188
1 optional FEM course from list of optional courses

Fall: 1 from: POL4310, POL4320, POL4330, POL4350, POL4930
2 optional courses at 3000- or 4000-level from list of optional courses
Winter: 1 optional course at 3000- or 4000-level from list of optional courses
1 optional course at 4000-level from list of optional courses
1 optional FEM course from list of optional courses
